title: Lag?
body: Has anyone else had lag spikes since new patch? before patch steady 19-23 ping, now i spike sometimes up to 100? Granted i have changed bundles within telstra, but a speed test says 15 ping with 20 download and 4 upload (same as before) and my ping doesnt spike on any other games? halp..

replies.body: I've been getting really bad lag recently as well, sometimes spiking up to 300 and even disconnecting, which is odd as I usually run a constant 50 and almost never get any odd lag spikes or weird net behaviour
My health bar and champion shake for the first few minutes while the camera is locked...
